name: John Carter
info: Highly skilled Lead Architect with extensive experience in designing innovative and functional structures. Known for effective project management and client collaboration. Passionate about bringing architectural visions to life.

name: Andy Smith
info: Creative Interior Designer specializing in transforming spaces into captivating and harmonious environments. Known for expertise in color coordination, furniture selection, and personalized design implementation. Committed to creating spaces that reflect clients' unique styles.

name: Mike Warren
info: Experienced Construction Manager with a proven track record in project planning, site management, and quality assurance. Skilled in budgeting and cost control, ensuring successful project execution. Committed to safety compliance and delivering high-quality construction projects.
